@GinaTeen

GET A LIFE

c'mon now, you're not even trying! yelling 'virus' at every torrent to try and scare people away from downloading is bad enough, but when the bullshit you're screaming doesn't even make sense??

i will be d/ling this and testing it. i can say almost for sure that it's not going to be lesbian porn, but i'll be commenting when it's finished

thanks for ripping this, the work is always appreciated :)

however, i would be remiss not to report that there are several glitches in the files. 
these glitches range from small visual distortions to massive distortions to a few missing seconds. 
in frequency, they range from only 1 or 2 small occurrences to dozens. it is getting worse and is now starting to affect the storyline (i'm on ep 9 now)


i think this should be reup'd for the more serious collectors among us :)

p.s. will be downing the season 2 FASM right now .. look for comments in a couple days

ok so i finished the first season with few or no glitches (ep 10 - 13) 

i'm finishing my download of season 2 .. 80ish percent

i'll be going over the season 1 eps again to make a more detailed report


IN SUMMARY:
the few distortions that i did notice, except at their worst (ep 9 comes to mind), did not interfere with the storyline. 
Also, the small file size is a treat for the quality level (which is consistent with files twice their size).
This torrent would be more than fine for the average viewer, but the serious collector will have to look elsewhere for perfect files.



season 2 FASM review to follow in a few days


Thanks Fachman and DJ Sooflet. Without the effort of people like you, this community would not exist :)
This torrent is 1 year old and still ALIVE. Thank you people for your support.

downloaded one episode of the series, i must agree that collectors must look somewhere else,  personaly the show is my favourite and i was interested in seeing the quality of this torrent but not as i hoped, the file is small but the quality isn't there even if the resolution is high, maybe a lower resolution would have better quality with the same file size, i must say that i haven't checked other torrents from FASM

thanks  for trying
